title: The Gideon Protocol
description: Thirteen year-oldÂ Gideon Wells wants to escape the Off World mining colony and return to Earth before he is captured by a scientist who needs his DNA to perfect her army of bio-engineered monsters. When Gideon has his chance to escape, he's forced to choose between saving the life of a fourteen year-old girl or returning to Earth.
author: L.C. Hanson
